name: DecompApp
brief:
User application interface - derive to define your decomposition

DecompApp is the main user-facing class. Derive from it to define:
- Model decomposition (core vs relaxed constraints)
- Subproblem solvers
- Problem-specific heuristics

algorithms.name:
Primal Heuristics (APPheuristics):
Generate feasible solutions during branch-and-price.

  INPUT: Current fractional solution x̂
  OUTPUT: Feasible integer solutions (incumbents)

  Good incumbents:
    - Improve global upper bound
    - Enable more pruning in B&B tree
    - Guide branching decisions

see: DecompAlgo.h for algorithm that uses this app
